DOC.detailed_description: The dopamine system play important role various neurological psychiatric disorder Parkinson 's disease , schizophrenia , mood disorder , attention-deficit hyperactivity disorder . Several positron emission tomography ( PET ) single photon emission compute topography ( SPECT ) tracer develop include [ 11C ] CFT [ 123I ] beta-CIT . These tracer successfully applied patient , particularly stage Parkinson 's disease . However , tracer lack selectivity among monoamine ( dopamine , serotonin , norepinephrine ) transporter . Recently new PET tracer , [ 18F ] FECNT brain uptake washout develop , high selectivity affinity dopamine transporter ( DAT ) . Part 1 study measure kinetics [ 18F ] FECNT brain uptake washout . Part 2 estimate radiation-absorbed dos healthy human subject perform whole body PET image study . Part 3 assess reliability measure DAT density brain perform test retest brain PET study healthy human subject .
